custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is Viewing the Scan View
AND "appleWalletEnabled": true
custom_steps_separated.expected: There will be an "Options" button located in the bottom right corner of the scan view.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is Viewing the Scan View
AND "appleWalletEnabled": false

When the user is Viewing the Scan View
AND the user Taps the "Options" button
custom_steps_separated.expected: There will be an "Add to Wallet " and "Cancel" button displayed at the bottom of the scan view

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is Viewing the Scan View
AND the user Taps the "Options" button
AND Taps "Cancel"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The "Add to Wallet" and "Cancel buttons are dismissed
And the Ticket Scan View remains in view.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is Viewing the Scan View
AND the user Taps the "Options" button
AND Taps "Add to Wallet"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The Pass Preview will be displayed
And the user will have the option to either Add or Cancel the Ticket Add.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is Viewing the Pass Preview
AND taps the "Cancel Button"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The Pass Preview Slides down and dismissed
AND the Ticket Scan View is displayed.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is Viewing the Pass Preview
custom_steps_separated.expected:
There will be team matchup (away@home)
AND to the left of the matchup will be a Cancel button
AND to the right of the matchup there will be an Add button.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is Viewing the Pass Preview
